means: 不同意，持异议( dissent的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: There was no disagreement, there were no dissenting voices.
sentence.Network_cn: 既没有争执，也没有异议。

sentence.Network_en: There are likely to be many dissenting voices.
sentence.Network_cn: 可能会有很多不赞成的声音。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... dissentient 反对的 dissenting 不同意的 dissentious 好争论的.

list.abs: 常用动词... ... dismiss sth．from 从……消除…… dissent from 不同意……；和某人（意见）不一致 distinguish sth．from sth． 识别…
读报笔记：美最高法院支持医保法案... ... struck down： 击倒 dissent from： 与……意见不同 The Supreme Court： 联邦最高法院.
办案期间常撰写异议书 （dissenting opinion），据说其内容极其精彩，故有「伟大的异议者」（The Great Dissenter）之称 9 maker o…
翻译词典... ... dissenting opinion 反对意见 dissenting judgment 异议判决 dissenting creditor 持异议债权人.
...反对登记通知书 Advice of Notice of Objection反对票 dissenting vote反对票 negative vote

entry.tran: (尤指与多数人或权威人士的)意见不一致,意见分歧
entry.def: Dissent is strong disagreement or dissatisfaction with a decision or opinion, especially one that is supported by most people or by people in authority.

example.ex: He is the toughest military ruler yet and has responded harshly to any dissent...
example.tran: 他是迄今最强硬的军事统治者，对任何异议都一律进行打压。

example.ex: Political dissent would no longer be tolerated...
example.tran: 政见不和将不再被容忍。

entry.tran: 不同意，持异议(尤指与多数人或权威人士支持的观点、决定相左)
entry.def: If you dissent, you express disagreement with a decision or opinion, especially one that is supported by most people or by people in authority.

example.ex: Just one of the 10 members dissented...
No one dissents from the decision to unify...
example.tran: 没有人反对统一的决定。

auth_sentence.content: The scientific community absolutely refuses to discuss dissenting opinions.
auth_sentence.res_content: The scientific community absolutely refuses to discuss dissenting opinions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The scientific community absolutely refuses to discuss dissenting opinions.

auth_sentence.content: On only two occasions did dissenting views become public.
auth_sentence.res_content: On only two occasions did dissenting views become public.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: On only two occasions did dissenting views become public.

auth_sentence.content: Its large number of dissenting replies illustrate this.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its large number of dissenting replies illustrate this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its large number of dissenting replies illustrate this.
